local_schema.longdesc: List of components that are required as part of the session. (Each element names a key under "/desktop/mate/session/required_components"). The Startup Applications preferences tool will not normally allow users to remove a required component from the session, and the session manager will automatically add the required components back to the session at login time if they do get removed.

local_schema.short_desc: Time before session is considered idle
local_schema.longdesc: The number of minutes of inactivity before the session is considered idle.
List of applications that are part of the default session.
